scripts.update-ccr-fields-prod: clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js operation=updateCCRfields
scripts.update-ccr-fields-dev: clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node index.js operation=updateCCRfields
scripts.subsidies-rpa-search-dev: clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node index.js operation=subsidiesRpaSearch
scripts.subsidies-rpa-search-prod: clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js operation=subsidiesRpaSearch
scripts.update-rpa-logs-dev: clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node index.js operation=updateRpaLogs
scripts.update-rpa-logs-prod: clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js operation=updateRpaLogs
scripts.update-terms-dev: clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node index.js operation=updateTerms
scripts.update-terms-prod: clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js operation=updateTerms
